snippet.title: Beyond the Map - Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2896380?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=trailer1

Beyond the Map is a survival ARPG set in a procedurally-generated fantasy world. Build your base, craft powerful armor, and embark on a journey to uncover ancient secrets of this mysterious realm.

Forge your own path without the constraints of traditional classes. Level up your skills to unlock new baseline abilities, and search the world for rare spellbooks that grant you extraordinary powers!

Establish your own base and master a variety of professions to craft and upgrade your armor and weapons. Create potions and enchantments that will be essential for your survival in this unforgiving environment.

Explore a vast, procedurally generated world and progress through distinct biomes, each filled with unique enemies, resources, and challenges.
